MajorClaims.MC1: I would prefer to work for myself, and have my own business
MajorClaims.MC2: people that have their own business are more comfortable

Claims.C1: working for the other have some advantages
Claims.C2: They have more opportunities, profits, and authorities
Claims.C3: there are a large number of opportunities in privat works that you cannot find them when you work for the others
Claims.C4: when people work for themselves they make more profit for themselves, but in the other jobs you make profits for the other such as your manager
Claims.C5: there are some authorities in privat jobs that workers are always looking for them while they are working for the others

Premises.P1: In your job you can be boss of yourself; however, in the other jobs someone else are your boss
Premises.P2: You always have to be responsible for your task, and it make a stressful situation that I never like it
Premises.P3: nowadays most of them pick up this profit without sharing a small sum of it with their workers, and from my point of view it is unfair
Premises.P4: When you work for yourself you can punch in and punch out whenever you want
Premises.P5: Sometimes some occasions happen to people for example a disease, sticking in a traffic jam and sometime going on a vacation
Premises.P6: For all of them we have to ask for a permission, and most of the time we are not allowed
